6 HP1_RC_TPT::HP1_RC_TPT()
7 : sample_rate(0.0), s(0.0), g1(0.0)
8 {
9 }
10
11 void HP1_RC_TPT::reset(double _sample_rate)
12 {
13 sample_rate = _sample_rate;
14
15 s = 0.0;
16 g1 = 0.0;
17 }
18
19 double HP1_RC_TPT::process(double x)
20 {
21 // Calculate output for low-pass
22 double v = g1 * (x - s);
23 double y = v + s;
24
25 // Update state register
26 s = v + y;
27
28 // Subtract low-pass output from input to find high-pass output
29 return x - y;
30 }
31
32 void HP1_RC_TPT::set_cutoff(double cutoff)
33 {
34 // Calculate gamma from cutoff
35 const double w = bdsp::constants::TWO_PI * cutoff;
36 const double g = w / (2.0 * sample_rate);
37 g1 = g / (1.0 + g);
38 }
39
40 void HP1_RC_TPT::set_cutoff_prewarp(double cutoff)
41 {
42 // Calculate gamma from prewarped cutoff
43 const double w_prewarped = mappings::prewarp(cutoff, sample_rate);
44 const double g = w_prewarped / (2.0 * sample_rate);
45 g1 = g / (1.0 + g);
46 }
47
48 void HP1_RC_TPT::set_cutoff_g1(double _g1)
49 {
50 g1 = _g1;
51 }
52
53 double HP1_RC_TPT::get_state()
54 {
55 return s;
56 }
57
58} // namespace bdsp::filter
